front.title: Extended Remote Authentication Dial In User Service (RADIUS) Attributes

abstract.t: For the Remote Authentication Dial In User Service (RADIUS) protocolto continue to support new applications, the RADIUS attribute typespace must be extended beyond the current limit of 255 possibleattribute types while maintaining backwards compatibility with theexisting protocol. This document defines a mechanism to accomplishthat task, along with standard methods to group together relatedattributes and to encode values that don't fit into 253 octets.
